description.description: The description of the routing rule

id.description: Used to identify resource at nexus

matchers.description: Matchers is a list of regular expressions used to identify request paths that are allowed or blocked (depending on above mode)

mode.description: The mode describe how to hande with mathing requests. Possible values: `BLOCK` or `ALLOW` Default: `BLOCK`

name.description: The name of the routing rule

block.description: Use this resource to create a Nexus Routing Rule.

id.description: Used to identify resource at nexus

name.description: The name of the script.

type.description: The type of the script. Default: `groovy`

block.description: Use this resource to create and execute a custom script.

enabled.description: Activate the anonymous access to the repository manager. Default: false

id.description: Used to identify resource at nexus

realm_name.description: The name of the used realm. Default: "NexusAuthorizingRealm"

user_id.description: The user id used by anonymous access. Default: "anonymous"

block.description: Use this resource to change the anonymous configuration of the nexus repository manager.

description.description: A description of the content selector

id.description: Used to identify resource at nexus

name.description: Content selector name

block.description: Use this resource to create a Nexus Content Selector.

auth_password.description: The password to bind with. Required if authScheme other than none.

auth_realm.description: The SASL realm to bind to. Required if authScheme is CRAM_MD5 or DIGEST_MD5

auth_schema.description: Authentication scheme used for connecting to LDAP server

auth_username.description: This must be a fully qualified username if simple authentication is used. Required if authScheme other than none.

connection_retry_delay_seconds.description: How long to wait before retrying

connection_timeout_seconds.description: How long to wait before timeout

group_base_dn.description: The relative DN where group objects are found (e.g. ou=Group). This value will have the Search base DN value appended to form the full Group search base DN.

group_id_attribute.description: This field specifies the attribute of the Object class that defines the Group ID. Required if groupType is static

group_member_attribute.description: LDAP attribute containing the usernames for the group. Required if groupType is static

group_member_format.description: The format of user ID stored in the group member attribute. Required if groupType is static

group_object_class.description: LDAP class for group objects. Required if groupType is static

group_subtree.description: Are groups located in structures below the group base DN

group_type.description: Defines a type of groups used: static (a group contains a list of users) or dynamic (a user contains a list of groups). Required if ldapGroupsAsRoles is true.

id.description: Used to identify resource at nexus

ldap_groups_as_roles.description: Denotes whether LDAP assigned roles are used as Nexus Repository Manager roles

name.description: LDAP server name

port.description: LDAP server connection port to use

protocol.description: LDAP server connection Protocol to use

search_base.description: LDAP location to be added to the connection URL

use_trust_store.description: Whether to use certificates stored in Nexus Repository Manager's truststore

user_base_dn.description: The relative DN where user objects are found (e.g. ou=people). This value will have the Search base DN value appended to form the full User search base DN.

user_email_address_attribute.description: This is used to find an email address given the user ID

user_id_attribute.description: This is used to find a user given its user ID

user_ldap_filter.description: LDAP search filter to limit user search
